reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 485/01: LEGISLATIVE GRANTS - TRANSPORTATION SUPPLEMENT (NO. 2)
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 485/01: LEGISLATIVE GRANTS - TRANSPORTATION SUPPLEMENT (NO. 2)

content.content: 1. A district school board shall be paid the amount set out in Column 2 of the Table opposite the name of the board in Column 1 of the Table, as a transportation supplement. O. Reg. 485/01, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. A district school board shall be paid the amount set out in Column 2 of the Table opposite the name of the board in Column 1 of the Table, as a transportation supplement. O. Reg. 485/01, s. 1.

content.content:
